line_1: So the fierce Centaurs ravag'd o'er the Dales;
line_2: What eager Fire, their rapid March reveals!

line_1: High sunny Summits, deeply shaded Dales,
line_2: Thick Mossy Banks, and flow'ry winding Vales,

line_1: Thro' bush, thro' brake, thro' groves and gloomy dales,
line_2: Thro' dank and dry, o'er streams and flowery vales,

line_1: Circling thro' pendant cliffs, and watery dales.
line_2: The banks are white with swelling sails,

line_1: Come wildly rove thro' desart dales
